reviewText: After watching this video I wondered why I bought it and wished it were returnable. The demo dogs have already been pre-groomed so you won't learn anything there. You have to buy the "Basic Dog Grooming" DVD which is also overpriced.  Don't waste your money.

DVD quality is a 5. Watching Greg in action was next to

hands-on training. The lessons were easy to understand and with your creative mind and undiscovered skills... you could actually be as good a groomer as the famous Greg Kellas!
